aria-required-children:
HTML elements with aria roles should contain the corresponding child roles as follows:

1. `role="application"` should contain `role="document"` or `role="main"`
2. `role="banner"` should contain `role="heading"`
3. `role="complementary"` should contain `role="region"`
4. `role="contentinfo"` should contain `role="status"`
5. `role="form"` should contain `role="search"`
6. `role="list"` should contain `role="listitem"`
7. `role="listbox"` should contain `role="option"`
8. `role="menu"` should contain `role="menuitem"`
9. `role="menubar"` should contain `role="menuitem"`
10. `role="navigation"` should contain `role="link"`
11. `role="region"` should contain `role="article"`
12. `role="table"` should contain `role="rowgroup"`, `role="row"`, and `role="cell"`
13. `role="tabpanel"` should contain `role="tablist"` and `role="tab"`
